name: Friday Night At The Prison
description:
You took an offer to work at a prison but... Not any normal prison, a prison with many "monsters" in it

Click for everything

Make sure your oxygen does go out (click the bar to refill) or you die.

DON'T let the lights go out or an animatronic will get you!

Check the Locator to see where the "Monsters" are then close vents and door accordingly
